recipe.title: Frozen Mint Lemonade
ingredients: About 3 cups ice cubes, cracked if large
instructions: Blend lemon juice, sugar, and mint leaves in a blender until leaves are finely chopped and sugar is dissolved. Add water and enough ice cubes to fill blender, then blend until smooth. Serve immediately.
